DESCRIPTION: If you are in a #yStance, trigger its Skill Bonus.
Extra effect when played in the listed #yStance.
Requires being in a Stance. NL After playing a Finisher, exit your Stance and trigger its Finisher bonus.
The next time you take #yAttack damage, deal damage back.
#yStance. NL #ySkill Bonus: Gain #b3 #yCounter. NL #yFinisher Effect: Gain #b10 #yBlock.
#yStance.  NL #ySkill Bonus: Gain #b2 #yVigor. NL #yFinisher Effect: Gain #b1 #yStrength.
#yStance. NL #ySkill Bonus: Draw a card. NL #yFinisher Bonus: Next turn, draw #b1 card and gain [E] . End your turn.
#yStance. Counts as both #yDefensive and #yBerserker #yStances. NL If you leave this #yStance before it expires, immediately re-enter it.
Lose HP. Restore #yFatigued HP at the end of combat. You won't die from #yFatigue .
